faq.title: Have questions?
faq.subtitle: Here we answer your most frequent questions.

questions.question: What is Mecanet and how does it help me?
questions.answer: Mecanet is software that organizes and automates your machinery maintenance. It prevents oversights, reduces failures, and improves control of your operation.

questions.question: Does the free plan have a time limit?
questions.answer: No, the free plan has no time limit. You can use it indefinitely with the included basic features.

questions.question: What if I need more assets or users?
questions.answer: You can upgrade to our Professional or Corporate plans at any time to increase asset and user capacity according to your needs.

questions.question: Do I need to install anything?
questions.answer: No, Mecanet is a web application that works completely in the cloud. You only need an updated web browser to access it from any device.
